# Doppelganger Transformation (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]] \[[[Mindset Spells|mindset]]]

**Level:** [[8th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 8]], [[Transformation (Domain)|Transformation 7]], [[8th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 8]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 16th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 16]]

**Components:** V, S, DF

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Range:** Personal

**Target:** You

**Duration:** 1 minute/level

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Races of Eberron (WotC), pg. 184

You take on some of the qualities of a doppelganger, gaining improved mental and physical abilities. When you cast this spell, you gain a +4 enhancement bonus to Wisdom and a +2 enhancement bonus to Strength, Dexterity, Constitution, and Charisma. Your skin toughens, granting you a +4 natural armor bonus to AC (though this doesnâ€™t stack with existing natural armor). You also gain darkvision out to 60 feet and are immune to sleep and charm effects for the duration of the spell.

*Special:* Changeling spellcasters cast this spell at +1 caster level.

*Mindset:* While this spell is prepared, you gain a +2 bonus on [[Bluff (Skill)|Bluff]] and [[Disguise (Skill)|Disguise]] checks and a +2 bonus on saving throws against sleep and charm effects.

**GM Note**

*House Rule:* Added Sorcerer 8, Wizard 8 to Level.
